/home/kien/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21/smpi_script/bin/smpicc   -g3 -std=gnu11   -O3 -funroll-loops -fno-strict-aliasing  -finline-functions  -fdebug-prefix-map=/home/kien/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21=. -flto   -rdynamic CMakeFiles/coll-reduce-scatter.dir/coll-reduce-scatter/coll-reduce-scatter.c.o  -o coll-reduce-scatter/coll-reduce-scatter -Wl,-rpath,/home/kien/project/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21/lib ../../lib/libsimgrid.so.3.21 -lm /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_context.so -lpthread -lrt /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so -lgfortran   -Wl,--as-needed -latomic -Wl,--no-as-needed
